metadata.title: CVE-2019-3565 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Legacy C++ Facebook Thrift servers (using cpp instead of cpp2) would noterror upon receiving messages with containers of fields of unknown type. Asa result, malicious clients could send short messages which would take along time for the server to parse, potentially leading to denial ofservice. This issue affects Facebook Thrift prior to v2019.05.06.00.

criterions.comment: reminders-app: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
